section.p: A company makes three products (A, B en C). To manufacture each product a different number of working hours and amount of materials is needed. In following figure you see the rates for labour and material costs as well as the quantities needed to make these products. Also the costs and revenues are calculated for the current production quantities.
Enter the model in a worksheet. Provide the right formulas in the cells which values have to be calculated.

Management wants a prediction of the operating profit, but there is still some uncertainty about the amount of labor and material costs. For the prediction are therefore three scenarios available: the most favorable case, the most bad case and the current (most likely) case. The different rates are listed in the following table.
Create a summary report for these three scenarios using the Scenario Manager.

section.title: Solution
section.p:
Create the scenarios with tab Data What-If Analysis (group Data Tools) Scenario Manager .
Changing cells: Wages, Material costs
Scenario summary result cells: Operating profit
To get names instead of cell addresses in the summary report you should give names to the cells before using the scenario manager.
